description:
The race moves to the sea for its second day, but http://anidb.net/ch114296 [Eva] is still far in the lead. http://anidb.net/ch114297 [Shelley] pushes herself to catch up, but can her body take the strain? Meanwhile, http://anidb.net/ch115603 [Yana] struggles with her divided loyalties.
Source: Funimation
